author: m0_ox
content: [bal@v4.0.0](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/bal%40v4.0.0) was released with full `bal-devnet-2` support - EIP-7928 (BALs) was extended with spec implementation and tests for EIP-7708, EIP-7778, EIP-7843, and EIP-8024 filled for Amsterdam. Please use these to test against `bal-devnet-2` branches.

author: m0_ox
content:
^ note that this _does_ include EIP-7778 `gasSpent` for transaction receipts (current spec). So if this is _not_ implemented clients will not pass this with receipts root mismatches. This looks like it's in flux and should ideally be decided on ACDT. If this does change in the spec, we will release an updated version of the tests asap.

edit: put up a [discussion point](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1882#issuecomment-3793080772) to try to get consensus on this by ACDT
